original_text: Beloved, I am writing you no new commandment, but an old commandment that you had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word that you have heard.
korean_text: 사랑하는 자들아 내가 새 계명을 너희에게 쓰는 것이 아니라 너희가 처음부터 가진 옛 계명이니 이 옛 계명은 너희가 들은 바 말씀이거니와

sentences.original_text: I am writing you no new commandment,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희에게 새 계명을 쓰지 아니하고,

sentences.original_text: that you had from the beginning.
The old commandment is the word
